subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Unlike Daisuke Matsuzaka, Hideki Okajima did not come with a nine-figure price tag or the international intrigue of baseball’s posting process. His signing was not broadcast live on two continents. Okajima came in under the news media radar.
snippet: Unlike Daisuke Matsuzaka, Hideki Okajima did not come with a nine-figure price tag or the international intrigue of baseball’s posting process. His signing was not broadcast live on two continents. Okajima came in under the news media radar.
